snippet:
An outfit called Martian Watches has created one of the most advanced options yet to put smartphone technology on your wrist.
   
The three lines of  Martian Watches  control your Apple or Android phone through a Bluetooth connection, but ...
abstract: Gadgetwise blog; Martian Watches introduces wristwatch that can control user's Apple or Android phone through Bluetooth connection. Photo (S)

headline.main: A Watch That Speaks to Your Phone and You

snippet:
Hackers hijacked the Twitter account for The Associated Press on Tuesday and sent out an erroneous message reporting explosions at the White House that injured President Obama.
   
Within minutes, Jay Carney, Mr. Obama’s press secre...

headline.main: In Hacking, A.P. Twitter Feed Sends False Report of Explosions

snippet: The company is developing a television set-top box and is talking with content providers to distribute video services.
abstract: Amazon is developing a television set-top box and is talking with outside content providers to distribute their video services to device.

headline.main: Amazon Plans an Internet Video Device

snippet: Three federal agencies said they were investigating Tuesday’s attack on the Twitter account of The Associated Press after a fake tweet posted by the hackers briefly caused financial markets to plunge.
abstract: Three federal agencies said they were investigating Tuesday’s attack on the Twitter account of The Associated Press after a fake tweet posted by the hackers briefly caused financial markets to plunge.

headline.main: Investigations Expand in Hacking of A.P. Twitter Feed

snippet: A report released on Wednesday by IDC, a leading technology research firm, concluded that paying for games on smartphones and tablets would outpace paid gaming on portable video game hand-held devices by the end of the year.
abstract: A report released on Wednesday by IDC, a leading technology research firm, concluded that paying for games on smartphones and tablets would outpace paid gaming on portable video game hand-held devices by the end of the year.

headline.main: Paid Games on Smartphones Expected to Outpace Hand-Held Consoles

abstract: The S.E.C.’s whistle-blower program faces challenges on several fronts. | Apple will more than double its program to return cash to shareholders. | The hedge fund manager Marc Lasry will not be moving to the United States ambassador’s mansion in Paris. | The S.E.C. has been flooded with calls to require publicly traded corporations to disclose political donations.

snippet: The Martian Watch, due out next month, sends voice commands to your Apple or Android phone through a Bluetooth connection. It also functions as a speakerphone and can read text messages and e-mails aloud.
abstract: The Martian Watch, due out next month, sends voice commands to your Apple or Android phone through a Bluetooth connection. It also functions as a speakerphone and can read text messages and e-mails aloud.

headline.main: Martian Watch Brings Wristphone Technology to Earthlings
headline.print_headline: A Watch That Speaks to Your Phone and You
